title: Laggy wierdness mana vanishing, people jumping lvls, game after game the same pattern
body:
Been coming back into lol after couple hours for the last 18 hours. And seem to get the same game, game after game. Where top is overly powerful, everything ether lags, or mana just vanishes and sudden death. Every attack or shot 100% without fail misses.  Attack speed movement speed and money generation comes down to it knees when near this person. And before u jump out and say lag, my ping and fps is quite normal.

When one takes a look at the scoreboard even more weirdness, particular the guy in the screen with 7 minion kills and 8 deaths yet is lvl 13 and plenty of items. Another great weirdness is lvl jumping, one min the guy ur vs is the same lvl, then next min hes 2 lvls higher with no addional kills. and wham ur full mana is now empty without casting a single spell or ur cooldown has tripled.

This keeps happening game after game, unless one plays at a really obscure time.
Its a shame I'm not sure what is going on but it has destroyed the game. I invested good time and money and nothing is being done, mentioned or action a pond. 

I for one have lost the love for the game because of this *weirdness*.

replies.body:
>action a pond

um

Anyway, that Thresh has eighteen bloody assists. It would be weird if he was under-levelled without items.

And you have extraordinarily high ping. Are you certain that it couldn't be that?
